item.title: China's Economic Data Release: What to Watch
item.description: China’s Economic Data Release: What to Watch China’s economy is slowing down, and the government is expected to cut interest rates to boost growth. The key data to watch in the upcoming release will be industrial production, retail sales, and fixed asset investment.
